question: What is/are the main aim of financial inclusion?
option1: to maintain a certain quantity of liquid assets with themselves at any point of time of their total time and
option2: to control money supply in the economy
option3: to provide basic banking services to all section of society in urban areas or rural areas at affordable cost
answer: to provide basic banking services to all section of society in urban areas or rural areas at affordable cost
explanation: Financial inclusion aims to bring in digital financial solutions for the economically underprivileged people of the nation. It also intends to bring in mobile banking or financial services in order to reach the poorest people living in extremely remote areas of the country.
